This repository conTains the dataset and  scripts for the wearable final R programming project for the JHU Data Science "Data Cleaning Course."

Files:

-WearableData.Rproject -> the R Studio project packaging all these files
-run_analysis.R -> source code with comments
-Codebook.md -> Contains the description of the source and all steps
-FinalData.txt -> final data set

To run the program you need the folder with all samsung data in a folder called "UCI HAR Dataset" with the same structure from the zip.

Then run the code of run_analysis.R.
